trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Germantown
There were no other sightings in Germantown on or around July 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home at around 10:30 PM. I looked to the east by occasion and then I saw this amber light that was too big to be a star or planet. It wasn't pulsating, but I can infer that it was very bright. I stared at it for 2 minutes and then it faded away. When I saw it I knew it was something abnormal. I told my parents after it faded and they didn't really buy it.
Summary: I saw a gloing light appear stationary for 1-2 minutes and then vanished.
